creditline: The Fred R. Salisbury II Fund
description: nickel body with frame enclosing a clear glass bowl; wheel-engraved decoration on bowl of eagle on one side and 'Wm. H. Huntington' inside a wreath on the other side
dimension: 12 x 7 3/8 x 7 7/8 in. (30.48 x 18.73 x 20 cm) (overall, without handle extended)
markings:
stamped, on bottom: [KELLY & CO/ROCHESTER]
incised lightly, below stamp: [1860]
title: Presentation lantern
